Objectives.1: Describe a FDA's view of its authority to regulate tobacco products, the relationship of other applicable federal/state laws with any potential FDA requirements, and any FDA contacts with parties in litigation against cigarette manufacturers.

Objectives.2: Describe the actions taken by FDA staff to develop the proposed tobacco regulations and how they identified and evaluated other regulatory options.

Objectives.3: Determine the amount of FDA resources expended on the promulgation of tobacco-related regulation and whether tobacco regulation diverted the agency from its other activities.

Objectives.4: Determine the economic impact of FDA's proposed rule on tobacco production and tobacco farmers.

Objectives.5: Determine how FDA responded to various requests from the House Agriculture Subcommittee on Risk Management and Specialty Crops.
